title: Tilgate Forest Park Walks and Mtb

images.title: Chris Plunkett / Tilgate lake,Tilgate park,Crawley.
images.caption: Tilgate lake,Tilgate park,Crawley. Photo taken facing roughly south east showing what was called Campbells lake after the former world water speed record holder Sir Donald Campbell,who used to keep his boat here.

images.title: Pete Chapman / Tilgate Lake, Tilgate Park, Crawley
images.caption: Tilgate Park is the largest public park in Crawley. Before the development of the Crawley New Town, it was the home of the Campbell family. Malcolm Campbell developed and tested his designs of the "Bluebird" world water speed record holding boats on this lake in the 1930s and 40s.

images.title: Elliott Simpson / Tilgate Park
images.caption: A new viewing platform at the duck pond in the animal park.

images.title: Barry Shimmon / The Inn in the Park, Tilgate Park, Crawley
images.caption: The Inn in the Park, Tilgate Park, Crawley

description: Tilgate Country Park is a popular large park and forest area in Crawley, Sussex. Here you'll find stunning lakes, lawns, gardens and miles of woodland and bridleways. There are also very good facilties with a Nature Centre, cafe and a delightful Walled Garden with a maze and picnic area. There are many walking trails but Tilgate is popular with mountain bikers too, while National Cycle Route 20 also runs through the park. Our London to Brighton Cycle Route passes through the park and is a good way to continue your exercise. It's a popular route running along signed paths all the way to the coast.

details.subtitle: Dog Walking
details.content: The woodland trails are ideal for dog walking so you'll probably see plenty of other owners on your visit.

details.subtitle: Further Information and Other Local Ideas
details.content: The popular Worth Way starts in Crawley. This shared cycling and walking trail runs along a disused railway line to East Grinstead. St Leonard's Forest is also nearby and well worth exploring. For more walking ideas in the area see the Sussex Walks page.

display_address: Tilgate Forest Golf Centre, Titmus Drive, Tilgate, Crawley, West Sussex, England, RH10 5EU, United Kingdom
